targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu") FROM "cpustat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT ("memused" / "memtotal") FROM "memory" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ("swapused" / "swaptotal") FROM "memory" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

panels.description: Current swap memory usage on the host

targets.query:
SELECT 
    last("cpus") as "vCPUs", 
    last("status") as "status_raw", 
    last("template") as "template_flag", 
    (last("uptime")/86400) as "uptime_days", 
    last("cpu") as "cpu_usage", 
    last("maxmem") as "Memory", 
    last("mem") as "memory_used", 
    last("balloon") as "non_ballooned_memory", 
    (last("mem")/last("maxmem")) as "Memory usage (%)", 
    last("swap") as "swap_used", 
    (last("swap")/last("maxswap")) as "Swap usage (%)", 
    last("maxdisk") as "Disk", 
    (last("disk")/last("maxdisk")) as "Disk usage (%)", 
    last("diskread") as "disk_read", 
    last("diskwrite") as "disk_write", 
    last("netin") as "network_in", 
    last("netout") as "network_out" 
FROM "system" 
WHERE 
    ("object" = 'qemu' OR "object" = 'lxc') 
    AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) 
    AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY 
    "vmid", 
    "host", 
    "object", 
    "nodename"
SELECT last("cpu") FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host", "nodename" fill(null)
SELECT (mean("mem")/last(maxmem))*100  FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "nodename" fill(null)
SELECT last("cpu") FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("mem")/last(maxmem))*100 FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'lxc') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "node", "host", "nodename" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

-- 查询
SELECT 
    last("used") AS "Used",
    last("total") AS "Total", 
    last("used") / last("total") AS "Utilization"
FROM "system" 
WHERE "nodename" = '$server' 
AND host=~/^$storage$/
AND $timeFilter

targets.expr: pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_disk_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} * on (id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info{type="lxc"}

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpustat" WITH KEY = "host"
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpustat" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='storages'
list.name: storage

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='storages'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nics WITH KEY=~/^instance$/ WHERE instance !~ /^veth/ AND instance !~ /^tap/ AND instance !~ /^fw/ AND instance != 'lo'
list.name: interfaces

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nics WITH KEY=~/^instance$/ WHERE instance !~ /^veth/ AND instance !~ /^tap/ AND instance !~ /^fw/ AND instance != 'lo'
